revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contribs/98.233.221.206|98.233.221.206]] ([[User talk:98.233.221.206|talk]]) to last version by Figureskatingfan
revision.text: {{Talk header}} {{ArticleHistory|action1=GAN |action1date=04:20, 28 May 2009 (UTC) |action1link=Talk:Adelaide Anne Procter/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=292550984 |action2=PR |action2date=00:44, 23 August 2009 |action2link=Wikipedia:Peer review/Adelaide Anne Procter/archive1 |action2result=reviewed |action2oldid=309314744 |action3=FAC |action3date=21:07, 27 September 2009 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Adelaide Anne Procter/archive1 |action3result=promoted |action3oldid=316548330 | topic = langlit |currentstatus=FA |maindate=December 16, 2013 }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Biography|living=no|class=FA|a&e-work-group=yes|listas=Procter, Adelaide Anne}} {{WikiProject England|class=FA|importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Feminism|class=FA|importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Poetry|class=FA|importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Women's History|class=FA|importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Women writers|class=FA|importance=mid}} }} ==GA nom== I've re-done the entire article, as the 1911 Encyclopedia Britannica text was wholly inadequate and sexist to boot. Sadly, there's not much out there on AAP, but I believe I've found all major sources. I don't know if the article is beefy enough to warrant GA, but I'm nominating it anyway just to see. [[User:Ricardiana|Ricardiana]] ([[User talk:Ricardiana|talk]]) 05:06, 8 May 2009 (UTC) ==Nice job== This article looks pretty much like a one-person job. It's very informative. Thank you for all the effort. [[User:Jeffmatt|Jeffmatt]] ([[User talk:Jeffmatt|talk]]) 18:49, 17 July 2009 (UTC) :Thanks - and you're welcome! [[User:Ricardiana|Ricardiana]] ([[User talk:Ricardiana|talk]]) 21:00, 21 August 2009 (UTC) ==FAC nomination== This article is currently nominated for Featured Article status. Please follow the link at the very top of the page to leave comments. [[User:Ricardiana|Ricardiana]] ([[User talk:Ricardiana|talk]]) 20:49, 31 August 2009 (UTC) == How did this article ever make FA status? == It's illiterate, mis-spelt and unencyclopedic: "Procter never married. Reason unknown because she died as a single young woman, but probably wanted to do more in life then choosing the simple path of becoming an married woman." [[User:Tirailleur|Tirailleur]] ([[User talk:Tirailleur|talk]]) 20:46, 16 December 2013 (UTC) :I don't see that quote there. Did someone fix it already?--[[User:Obiwankenobi|Obi-Wan Kenobi]] ([[User talk:Obiwankenobi|talk]]) 21:42, 16 December 2013 (UTC) :As you could easily see by reviewing the article's history,[https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Adelaide_Anne_Procter&action=history] that sentence was both added and reverted just today. FA tend to attract a lot of ill-considered edits. [[User:Dwpaul|Dwpaul]] ''[[User talk:Dwpaul|Talk ]] '' 21:43, 16 December 2013 (UTC)
